title: Point of Interest Details
description: A point or place of interest (POI) Details. Used to capture the technical and metadata information for a POI.

xdm:POIID.title: POI Identity
xdm:POIID.description: The unique identifier of the POI.

xdm:name.title: POI Name
xdm:name.description: The name given to the POI.

xdm:category.title: POI Category
xdm:category.description: General category assigned for organizing the POIs by the administrator of POI definitions.

xdm:type.title: POI Type
xdm:type.description: The general type of the POI using a typing schema selected by the administrator of the POI definitions.

xdm:distanceToPOICenter.title: Distance to POI Center
xdm:distanceToPOICenter.description: Estimated distance from the POI center in meters.

xdm:beaconInteractionDetails.title: Beacon Interaction Details
xdm:beaconInteractionDetails.description: Beacon details active for the POI interaction.

xdm:geoInteractionDetails.title: Geo Interaction Details
xdm:geoInteractionDetails.description: Geo details active for the POI interaction.
